marklogic.body: I moderate my consumption of all cable news despite the impulse to binge. MSNBC is shallow but efficient. I don't enjoy Shultz, find Bashir very difficult to watch...Chuck can be decent though I think I like Russert the younger in that Spot... anything after dinner I watch selectively on the internets. The night is best reserved for paper/ digital text and family interaction. Thomas has everything he needs to set up the midday content with sincerity. I really hope he sticks to that from this point on. Cheers!
